data.message: Considering that the 'G' stands for 'Graphics', this is really a no brainer...

replies.message: How do you pronounce "laser", "scuba", "NASA", "taser", "radar", "UNICEF", "snafu", "FUBAR", "SWAT", "IMAX", "pog", or "CARE package"? If you pronounce them "LAY-zer", "SKOO-buh", "NASS-uh", "TAY-zer", "RAY-dawr", "YOO-ni-seff", "SNAA-foo", "FOO-bar", "SWAHT", "EYE-macks", "PAHG", and "KAYR package", you don't believe your own line.
Hans Farnbach ?
Gotem
http://www.cnn.com/2013/05/22/tech/web/pronounce-gif/index.html
Gif(t)

Brandi: Laser stands for "Light Amplification through Stimulated Emission of Radiation. It's pronounced "STIM-yoo-lay-ted", not "ZTIM-yoo-lay-ted", and "ee-MISH-un", not "ih-MISH-un". The other acronyms also all contain letters that, in the word they are short for, are pronounced differently than how they are pronounced in the acronym.
Hans Farnbach still a better argument than anything in the "Jif" direction

No, its not because its so easily disproven. If you were to say the letters, it's "gee-eye-eff", which then gets shortened in pronunciation to "GIF" with a soft g. The original creator said its a soft g. Gin, where you don't add or take away letters, just replace.
"Steve Wilhite, the inventor of the widely used Web illustration, declared it should be pronounced“jif,” like the brand of peanut butter, rather than with a hard G sound"
Hans Farnbach hans do you pronounce "graphics" as "jrahics"? 🤣
Hans Farnbach have a product recommendation for you http://www.toysrus.com/graphics/product_images/pTRU1-3028220enh-z6.jpg
Mic: Do you pronounce "stimulated" like "ztimulated"? Or "underwater" like "oonderwater"? Laser and scuba are both acronyms that break that terrible "convention".
That "terrible convention"... this is what people argue about in 2017. Makes me wish I was born 100 years earlier.
Then you could instead argue about the gold standard!

🙋🏻 Thanks, 
I didn't know that 😊
What about words like gym, Geo, gin or gel?

Only works for IMAX. (Image maximum) You pronounce your listed acronyms with the sound of the first word it stands for. Not the words in the middle. Just like Nate's argument clearly states. 
Btw (<<how do you pronounce that acronym) I pronounce it jif.
Using the "G stands for Graphics" mentality, you mean "ih-maks"?
Creator of the Gif said it's pronounced Jif

The contents of an acronym have no effect on the pronunciation of the acronym.

And considering the guy who came up with the acronym GIF declared that it's pronounced "jif" (which he announced inside a GIF), id say G like Giraffe
Giraffics.
Hans Farnbach none of those have anything to do with GIF having a hard G
